column1: Business  Human Resources Program B134  George Brown College2024.json
column54: On-campus information sessions are held on a regular basis. Come and have your questions answered. Learn about the program content and career options, meet your friendly professors and staff, and experience what it is like to be in a George Brown College classroom.
column55: Sign up for an upcoming session.
